+ mary j. i stay with the trey pound i aint playin around i got my gat at all times thats the bottom line cause you hustle yeah til i lie in the crate cause you hustle yeah and im a try to get paid this for my niggas in the street that play with the heat its cassidy and m.j. on this swizz beat cause we hustle 12 months of the year we hustle times thats the bottom line cause we hustle til the day we die we hustle to keep our love alive to my fam in the streets we bringing the heat cassidy and mary j. on the swizz beat cause we hustle 7 days a week we hustle just to stay on our feet yeah

check it you can fear or respect it i wanna thank hov for clearing the record aight if you dont like this song right here then your ears infected you need to get your hearing corrected stones clear in the necklace i wear so much plat on my neck it put bruises on the back of my neck thats why cats is upset but i told you imma shine when its time to i put too much time in and i been rhymin since nine two i knew im a hustla was a hit cause everything i ever got i had to hustle to get aint nobody give me nothing for free but id probably be dead or in jail if it wasnt for t gettin booked is a bitch and catchin a slugs scary i need to feed my seed thanks for the love mary but seein me without the grams on the grind is like seein wesley snipes in the tanning salon  im... the hustla the hustla... yeah
